sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Migration dashboard level roles and groups for coreui dashboards to next experience dashboards. </description> <name>Migrate dashboard level roles and group</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) { var gr = new GlideRecord('par_coreui_migration_bridge_dashboard'); gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { if (gr.getValue('pa_dashboard')) SNC.MigrationServiceScriptable.migrateDashboardLevelGroupPermissions(gr.getValue('pa_dashboard')); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-16 10:46:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c6a1ab9aa3a102100abcad2f241e619e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Migrate dashboard level roles and group</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide PAR CoreUI Migration" source="com.snc.par.coreui.migration">40e853db47220210cd4e1ce4316d4323</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c6a1ab9aa3a102100abcad2f241e619e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-16 10:46:56</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Migrate dashboard level roles and group
